summary: MY VEHICLE HAS BEEN SERVICED AT FAIRWAY ON SEVERAL OCCASIONS, WHICH INCLUDED A SIMILAR PROBLEM OVER A YEAR AGO THAT WAS STILL UNDER WARRANTY.  THIS WAS FOR A CRACKED COOLANT CONTAINER AFTER I NOTICED THE LOW COOLANT LIGHT CAME ON MY MESSAGE CENTER. THIS SAME PROBLEM IS WHAT BROUGHT ME IN FOR MY RECENT VISIT.  I WANTED TO FIND OUT WHY THIS LIGHT WAS COMING ON AGAIN.  THIS TIME, THE ANSWER WAS $1012.70.  COINCIDENTALLY, THIS IS 3 MONTHS AFTER MY WARRANTY EXPIRED.   *NLM
